2 '''Allows to listen and recognize speech'''

8 import time
9 import random
10 import audioop
11 import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
12 
13 import logging

15 logging.basicConfig(filename='speech_recognizer.log', format='[%(asctime)s] %(message)s\n\n',
16  level=logging.ERROR)

18 class SpeechRecognizer:
19 
20 
21  def __init__(self, yandex_voice_key):
22  self.yandex_voice_key = yandex_voice_key
23 
24  def _make_uuid(self):
25 
26  symbols = '0123456789abcdef'
27  uuid = ''
28  for i in range(32):
29  uuid += symbols[random.randint(0, len(symbols) - 1)]
30  return uuid
31 
32  def asr_yandex(self, wav_data):
33 
34  try:
35  url = 'https://asr.yandex.net/asr_xml?uuid=' + self._make_uuid()
36  url += '&key=' + self.yandex_voice_key + '&topic=queries'
37 
38 
39  r = requests.post(url, wav_data, headers={
40  'Host': 'asr.yandex.net',
41  'Content-Type': 'audio/x-wav'
42  })
43 
44  root = ET.fromstring(r.text)
45  max_conf = 0
46  result = None
47  for child in root:
48  if child.tag == 'variant':
49  conf = float(child.attrib['confidence'])
50  if conf > max_conf:
51  max_conf = conf
52  result = child.text
53 
54  return result
55  except Exception as e:
56  logging.error(str(e))
57  return None
